Class JwtConfig

java.lang.Object
scot.gov.scotaccountclient.JwtConfig
@Configuration public class JwtConfig extends Object
Configuration class for JWT-related beans and settings. Provides beans for JWT decoding and validation using both Elliptic Curve and RSA keys. Automatically detects the key type and creates the appropriate decoder.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    JwtConfig.CustomJwtDecoder
    Custom JWT decoder that supports both EC and RSA keys.

  • Field Details

    • publicKeyPath

      @Value("${scotaccount.public-key-path:keys/public.pem}") private String publicKeyPath
      Path to the public key file used for JWT validation.

  • Constructor Details

    • JwtConfig

      public JwtConfig()
      Default constructor for JwtConfig.

      This constructor is used by Spring's dependency injection to create the JWT configuration bean.

  • Method Details

    • publicKey

      @Bean public PublicKey publicKey() throws Exception
      Creates a PublicKey bean by loading the public key from the classpath. Automatically detects whether the key is EC or RSA based on the key format.
      Returns:
      The public key for JWT validation (either EC or RSA)
      Throws:
      Exception - if the key cannot be loaded or parsed

    • jwtDecoder

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtDecoder jwtDecoder(PublicKey publicKey)
      Creates a JwtDecoder bean configured with the appropriate public key. Automatically handles both EC and RSA keys using a custom decoder.
      Parameters:
      publicKey - The public key for JWT validation
      Returns:
      A configured JwtDecoder instance

    • detectKeyType

      private String detectKeyType(byte[] keyBytes)
      Detects the key type based on the decoded key bytes. EC keys start with specific byte patterns that differ from RSA keys.
      Parameters:
      keyBytes - The decoded key bytes
      Returns:
      The key type ("EC" or "RSA")
